verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that they might bring <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves to king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> at the feast <S%H2282><s%> in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim, <S%H388><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> up the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And they brought <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> even those did the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> up.

And king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> to him, were with him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> that could not be told <S%H5608><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to his place, <S%H4725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, even under <S%H413><s%> <S%H478><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

For the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> forth their two <S%H8147><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above. <S%H4605><s%>

And they drew <S%H748><s%> out the staves, <S%H905><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%> out in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the oracle, <S%H1687><s%> and they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> without: <S%H2351><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they are to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There was nothing <S%H369><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H3240><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the priests <S%H3548><s%> were come <S%H3318><s%> out of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

So that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud: <S%H6051><s%> for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> that he would dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the thick darkness. <S%H6205><s%>
I have surely <S%H403><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> you an house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell <S%H2073><s%> in, a settled <S%H4349><s%> place for you to abide <S%H3427><s%> in for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> about, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> (and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stood; <S%H5975><s%>)

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and has with his hand <S%H3027><s%> fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> I chose <S%H977><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> an house, <S%H1004><s%> that my name <S%H8034><s%> might be therein; <S%H8033><s%> but I chose <S%H977><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to be over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it was in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> Whereas <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was in your heart <S%H3824><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> to my name, <S%H8034><s%> you did well <S%H3190><s%> that it was in your heart. <S%H3824><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> the house; <S%H1004><s%> but your son <S%H1121><s%> that shall come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of your loins, <S%H2504><s%> he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> to my name. <S%H8034><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has performed <S%H6965><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> that he spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and I am risen <S%H6965><s%> up in the room <S%H8478><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> promised, <S%H1696><s%> and have built <S%H1129><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I have set <S%H7760><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark, <S%H727><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with our fathers, <S%H1><s%> when he brought <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> forth his hands <S%H3027><s%> toward heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> you, in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> or on <S%H5921><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H8478><s%> who keep <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with your servants <S%H5650><s%> that walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you with all <S%H3605><s%> their heart: <S%H3824><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> have kept <S%H8104><s%> with your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that you promised <S%H1696><s%> him: you spoke <S%H1696><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> with your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and have fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it with your hand, <S%H3027><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> with your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that you promised <S%H1696><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> There shall not fail <S%H3772><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> in my sight <S%H6440><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so <S%H7535><s%> that your children <S%H1121><s%> take heed <S%H8104><s%> to their way, <S%H1870><s%> that they walk <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as you have walked <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

And now, <S%H6258><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> let your word, <S%H1697><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, be verified, <S%H539><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you spoke <S%H1696><s%> to your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father. <S%H1><s%>

But will God <S%H430><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the earth? <S%H776><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> contain <S%H3557><s%> you; how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> less this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> that I have built? <S%H1129><s%>

Yet have you respect <S%H6437><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and to his supplication, <S%H8467><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to the prayer, <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> prays <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to day: <S%H3117><s%>

That your eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day, <S%H3117><s%> even toward <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> you have said, <S%H559><s%> My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there: <S%H8033><s%> that you may listen <S%H8085><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> shall make toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

And listen <S%H8085><s%> you to the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> and when you hear, <S%H8085><s%> forgive. <S%H5545><s%>

If any man <S%H376><s%> trespass <S%H2398><s%> against his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and an oath <S%H423><s%> be laid <S%H5375><s%> on him to cause him to swear, <S%H422><s%> and the oath <S%H423><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your altar <S%H4196><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and do, <S%H6213><s%> and judge <S%H8199><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> condemning <S%H7561><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> to bring <S%H5414><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> on his head; <S%H7218><s%> and justifying <S%H6663><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> him according to his righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

When your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> be smitten <S%H5062><s%> down before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy, <S%H341><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, and shall turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to you, and confess <S%H3034><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> and pray, <S%H6419><s%> and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> to you in this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> them again <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> to their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

When heaven <S%H8064><s%> is shut <S%H6113><s%> up, and there is no <S%H3808><s%> rain, <S%H4306><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you; if they pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and confess <S%H3034><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> from their sin, <S%H2403><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you afflict <S%H6031><s%> them:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you teach <S%H3384><s%> them the good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they should walk, <S%H3212><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> on your land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have given <S%H5414><s%> to your people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> there be in the land <S%H776><s%> famine, <S%H7458><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> there be pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> blasting, <S%H7711><s%> mildew, <S%H3420><s%> locust, <S%H697><s%> or if <S%H3588><s%> there be caterpillar; <S%H2625><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> their enemy <S%H341><s%> besiege <S%H6887><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities; <S%H8179><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> plague, <S%H5061><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> there be;

What <S%H3605><s%> prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplication <S%H8467><s%> soever <S%H834><s%> be made by any <S%H3605><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> or by all <S%H3605><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of his own heart, <S%H3824><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> forth his hands <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place, <S%H4349><s%> and forgive, <S%H5545><s%> and do, <S%H6213><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> to every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H3605><s%> to his ways, <S%H1870><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> you know; <S%H3045><s%> (for you, even you only, <S%H905><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of men; <S%H120><s%>)

That they may fear <S%H3372><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> to our fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> a stranger, <S%H5237><s%> that is not of your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but comes <S%H935><s%> out of a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> for your name's <S%H8034><s%> sake; <S%H4616><s%>

(For they shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of your great <S%H1419><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> and of your strong <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and of your stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm; <S%H2220><s%>) when he shall come <S%H935><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> you in heaven <S%H8064><s%> your dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place, <S%H4349><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the stranger <S%H5237><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to you for: that all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> you, as do your people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have built, <S%H1129><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by your name. <S%H8034><s%>
